BR_text.BRsummary: An bug reported when the objective="binary:logistic" in xgboost
BR_text.BRdescription:
When using xgboost for binary classification, set in the with parameter: when objective is "binary: logistic", an error will be reported as following:
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24820352/70519454-ea58cb00-1b76-11ea-8ac0-63657ede14ae.png></denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Echo9573>@Echo9573</denchmark-link>
 , could you also post the example SQL so that we can try to reproduce it?

comments_1.comment_text:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tonyyang-svail>@tonyyang-svail</denchmark-link>
  , you can reproduce this in this way:
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24820352/71430684-40497900-2708-11ea-8f4e-1953ad8ec741.png></denchmark-link>

comments_2.comment_text:
Ah, it should be "binary" instead of "binaray". :)
 I will add a field checker that produces more meaningful messages on errors like this.
